title: Automated
p: The delivery driver takes the order in 15 minutes and delivers it immediately to the customer
download: Download our app via QR code
camera: Point your camera at the QR code to access the app
p2: Integrated quick menus with the ability to add new dishes and drinks offline and automatically updates for other users.
p3: Integrated quick posters create correct and effective directions for online ordering by customers and payment processing.
p4: Call systems are integrated with other systems of the company. It combines data collection and all technological devices for easy integration.
p5: All data is easily stored in one place. It makes it easy to find data or add data to the data.
p6: All service providers quickly and easily access information, automatic responses quickly identify and eliminate customer errors.
p7: All service providers quickly and easily access information, automatic responses quickly identify and eliminate customer errors.
p8: Process management and frequent order acceptance creates speed and cleanliness. It simplifies waiting and accepting orders.
p9: Management of posters, SMS services, telephony and delivery in the management system provides simple, efficient and complete management.
titleq6: working with a courier is even easier!
p10: Orders are accepted by the system automatically and on time, allowing you to choose from automatic courier lines and monitor each order.
menu3: Our application cooperates with Yandex Delivery to provide convenient services!
p11: Try Lamenu with high-quality, automated technology that controls your food service.
p12: Yandex Delivery simplifies services for further distribution and preparation for our partners.
